com.magnet.attributes.api

Interface AttributeMatch


  • public interface AttributeMatch
    A simple query that is a logical AND of a regular expression match at each parameter.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ANY_ATTRIBUTE
      A wild card that indicates all attributes are to be included.
      static int MAX_RESULT_DEFAULT 
      static int MAX_RESULTS_UNLIMITED 
      static int PAGE_NO_DEFAULT 
      static int PAGE_SIZE_DEFAULT 

    • Method Summary

      List<String> getAttributes()
      The attributes to include for the Entity that is being queried.
      String getEntityClass() 
      List<AttributeExpression> getExpressions()
      A list of conditional expresses that are applied to each entity Only entities with matching properties will be returned.
      com.magnet.api.MagnetUri getFilter()
      Only entities that match the specified MagnetUri pattern will be returned in the result set.

      List<AttributeOrdering> getOrderings()
      A set of orderings that are applied in order to affect the result

      Determine if the attribute specified should be included in the result set.

    • Method Detail

      • getEntityClass

        String getEntityClass()
        Returns:
        entity class as string

      • getStartPos

        int getStartPos()
        Returns:
        A request hint to start at the specified offset when returning results.

      • getMaxResults

        int getMaxResults()
        Returns:
        A request hint to limit the number of results that are returned.

      • getPageSize

        int getPageSize()
        Returns:
        The number of results to be return in a single block

      • getPageNo

        int getPageNo()
        Returns:
        The # of page

      • getFilter

        com.magnet.api.MagnetUri getFilter()
        Only entities that match the specified MagnetUri pattern will be returned in the result set.
        Returns:
        MagnetUri used for pattern matching

      • getAttributes

        List<String> getAttributes()
        The attributes to include for the Entity that is being queried. When a particular set of attributes is requested the resulting entities are considered to be "sparsely" populated and get invocations on these attributes will result in an exception.
        Returns:
        list of attribute names

      • isIncluded

        boolean isIncluded(String attributeName)
        Determine if the attribute specified should be included in the result set.
        Returns:
        true if included, false otherwise

      • getExpressions

        List<AttributeExpression> getExpressions()
        A list of conditional expresses that are applied to each entity Only entities with matching properties will be returned.
        Returns:
        list of attribute expressions

      • getOrderings

        List<AttributeOrdering> getOrderings()
        A set of orderings that are applied in order to affect the result
        Returns:
        list of attribute ordering

      • isAll

        boolean isAll()
        Returns:
        true if attributes is empty or has one value which is "*".
